name: GNM HealthCare Consulting Group
overview: GNM HealthCare Consulting Group, LLC provides interactive marketing information, e-marketing, and e-business solutions. The company offers interactive marketing, targeted, medical content, consulting, and content management services. It also offers peer review content for healthcare professionals; access to peer-reviewed journals and secondary databases platform; target segment identification; intelligence solutions; and scientific and clinical solutions. The company serves pharmaceutical companies in therapeutic areas, comprising hypertension and glaucoma, as well as Lysosomal disorders, Crohn diseases, neonatology, and transplantation. It has a subsidiary in London, the United Kingdom, as well as presence in Europe, the United States, and Asia. The company is based in New York, New York.
